name: Show Rocks John!
description:
Sounds are missing, except the seagull sound that announces it's arrival. Also the volume settings are not mapped yet. 

Press ESC in game to open the pause menu, when you have 33 rocks you have to go to the pile of rocks at the centre and touch it.

Story and controls are explained in-game. We advise you to read the instructions :D

We hope you'll enjoy it even though it is still unbalanced and incomplete :)

If you have any feedback, ideas, and suggestions please do write them in the comments, thank you for your feedback!

PATCH NOTES(1.0.1):

There were 2 small unintended bugs in the original jam version: 

  • The player flips the sprite when oscillating while idle
  • The player oscillates while going up and down
PATCH NOTES(1.0.2):
  • After several jam playtesters told me it was hard to pick rocks I noticed that the velocity needed to bend down was only taken on the X component, so going up and down didn't contribute. Now it is fixed and it is easier.

The above bugs are corrected now, but there is a (JAM VERSION) downloadable if you want to play the original game for voting. The original game with those bugs is also much harder, so you can play it if the game feels too easy now! :D
